contentItem.name: com.silabs.content.demos.c8051f970dk.kit.si8051.c8051f970dk.demo.f97x_pca0_16bit_pwm_output
contentItem.label: PCA0 16Bit PWM Output
contentItem.description:
16-bit PWM Example

This example project uses the PCA's PWM Output Mode to generate a
16-bit PWM Square Wave that is modulated in real time.
